sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Letter to a friend containing certain observations upon some passages which have been published in a late libell intituled, The third part of no Protestant-plot and which do relate to the kingdom of Ireland. Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.
23 p.
[s.n.], Dublin : Re-printed 1682.
Attributed by Wing to R. Ferguson. "The authorship of No Protestant plot is usualy ascribed to Shaftesbury, but claimed by Robert Ferguson"--National union catalog pre-1956 imprints. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

23 p.
[s.n.], Dublin : Re-printed 1682.
Attributed by Wing to R. Ferguson. "The authorship of No Protestant plot is usualy ascribed to Shaftesbury, but claimed by Robert Ferguson"--National union catalog pre-1956 imprints. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
